eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.api.impl
Class HttpRemoteEngineControl

java.lang.Object
  eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.api.impl.HttpRemoteEngineControl
All Implemented Interfaces:
AdvanceEngineControl
public class HttpRemoteEngineControl
extends java.lang.Object
implements AdvanceEngineControl

An AdvanceEngineControl implementation which translates the API calls into XML message exchanges through a HTTP(s) channel.

Author:
akarnokd, 2011.09.29.

debugBlock

public hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.base.Observable<eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.runtime.BlockDiagnostic> debugBlock(java.lang.String realm,
                                                                                                                      java.lang.String blockId)
                                                                                                               throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                                                                      AdvanceControlException
Ask for the observable sequence of block diagnostic messages for the given block within the given realm.

Remark: registering to this observable starts the HTTP message exchange and receives the records in the caller's thread. Consider using the Reactive.registerOn(Observable, hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.base.Scheduler)

Specified by:
debugBlock in interface AdvanceEngineControl
Parameters:
realm - the realm
blockId - the block unique identifier (as in the flow)
Returns:
the observable for the diagnostic messages
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if a network error occurs
AdvanceControlException - if the user is not allowed to debug in the realm or the block is missing

debugParameter

public hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.base.Observable<eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.runtime.PortDiagnostic> debugParameter(java.lang.String realm,
                                                                                                                         java.lang.String blockId,
                                                                                                                         java.lang.String port)
                                                                                                                  throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                                                                         AdvanceControlException
Ask for the observable sequence of port messages of the given port/block/realm.

Remark: registering to this observable starts the HTTP message exchange and receives the records in the caller's thread. Consider using the Reactive.registerOn(Observable, hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.base.Scheduler)

Specified by:
debugParameter in interface AdvanceEngineControl
Parameters:
realm - the realm
blockId - the block unique identifier (as in the flow)
port - the port name
Returns:
the observable of parameter messages
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if a network error occurs
AdvanceControlException - if the user is not allowed to debug in the realm or the referenced parameter is missing
